Description:
A Brilliant Beginning
Brand new and beautifully presented, this delightful home offers an affordable and attractive opportunity for an investment, first home buyers and buyers seeking a leisurely lifestyle. This home must be explored to truly appreciate it’s amazing offering.
SPECIFICATIONS:
- BEDROOMS: 4 large bedrooms (Master Bedroom with WIR and full Ensuite with Stone benchtop, double bowl vanity and toilet, other 3 Bedrooms serviced by a central bathroom with free-standing bathtub, Stone benchtop and double bowl vanity)
- KITCHEN: Open plan living/dining with 40 mm Stone benchtops, Gas cooktop,
900 mm Stainless Steel appliances, Dishwasher, Soft close cupboard doors and walk-in Pantry.
- LIVING AREAS: An impressive Formal lounge and Family living areas.
- HEAT/COOL: Evaporative cooling and ducted heating.
- LAUNDRY: Generous size laundry with storage space.
- PARKING: Double car garage with remote control.
- BACKYARD: A generous size backyard with an alfresco.
-DRIVEWAY AND PAVING: Exposed aggregate driveway and plain pairing concrete around the sides and back of the house.
- ADDITIONAL INCLUSIONS: Upgraded Façade with Cedar cladding, High ceilings, Downlights, Stone Benchtops, Shelves with WIR, Porcelain Modern Tiles and much more…
- LOCATION: Walking Distance to Future Park, Sports Ground, Future Private School, Future State Primary School, Future Retail Centre, Proposed Hospital, Future City Centre, Minutes’ drive to Future Train Station, Hume Freeway, Donnybrook Road, Service station, restaurants and café.
- BENEFITS: First Home Owners Grant and Stamp Duty Savings
(Subject to Govt. Policy)
The inspection is must, as this amazing opportunity will not last long.
Contact Achal Arora – 0432 413 929.

Description:
Brand New Affordable Home
Amazing Opportunity to buy this brand new home in the most popular area of Cloverton Estate. The house comprises of 3 bedrooms, modern open plan kitchen, family area, laundry, two bathrooms and a double garage. The master has walk-in-robe with en suite and other bedrooms have built in robes.
Other features include led downlights, 900mm cooktop, rangehood, Stone benchtop in kitchen, video intercom, security alarm, ducted vacuum, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, secure internal access from garage, epoxy garage floor and much more.
Situated in quiet location and only minutes from Hume freeway and Donnybrook train station.

* No Progress Payments

Description:
Brand New Home
You've ever wanted to live or invest in a brand new four bedroom home, with interior style and colour themes selected by a professional interior designer, then this home is what you've been looking for.
This home offers luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings and landscaping. You can purchase a brand new quality Porter Davis home and rest easy knowing all you have to do is move in when it's completed.
With four bedrooms and two bathrooms, including a master ensuite and walk in robe plus a double garage. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all included in this beautiful home. Plus, If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG.
Call now for further information or to arrange an inspection.
Images for illustration purposes only and include examples of upgrade options.

BRAND NEW FAMILY HOME!!!!!!
Cloverton Estate will become a centre of education north of Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all proposed for the area. A major retail centre is being planned, while public transport and medical services will provide everything the community needs.
Your Brand new Family home is under Construction now, and is waiting for you.
This Quality Built Modern Home is Designed to accommodate the demands of the astute buyer or growing families. Boasting a well-designed floor plan that features four spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, master with walk in robe and an en suite, second living, large state of the art kitchen with high quality .Well thought out home design, where small inclusions offered make the biggest difference.This Home will provide you a maximum enjoyment with a free flowing open plan meals and living area, giving direct outdoor access to your covered alfresco area.
Luxury inclusions; 900mm stainless steel appliances, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, stone bench tops, Double car lockup garage with access to rear and much more...

With a separate study and theatre/living area a sizable kitchen fitted with 900mm stainless steel appliances and 40mm stone waterfall benchtop, glass splashback and large walk in pantry. Adjoining meals area and living space that offers an abundance of natural sunlight, with sliding doors that venture out to an alfresco area to rear yard - perfect for entertaining family and friends.
This opportunity not to be missed contact us and organise an inspection today!

• Alarm system.
• Ducted heating.
• Evaporative cooling.
• Roller blinds throughout the house.
• High ceilings.
• Laminated timber flooring.
•Double remote garage with rear roller door access.
• Exposed aggregated driveway.
• Alfresco.

A Great opportunity to secure Your Future

Kalkallo is a only a short drive from Melbourne's CBD and is in the North's vibrant heartland and part of Victoria's northern expansion.
Kalkallo is an exciting new community in Melbourne's north that may offer your family a world of choice, enjoy access to the best of what Craigieburn and Epping has to offer, Close to the Hume Freeway and Donnybrook train
station.

Description:
BRAND NEW HOME IN KALKALLO
NEST OR INVEST in this beautiful brand new 4 Bedroom home in Cloverton Estate in Kalkallo which includes a Master bedroom with Walk in Robe and Ensuite. A theatre which can double as rumpus or a family retreat space. Every detail has been taken care of with A modern Kitchen with Island waterfall benchtops with walk in pantry and open plan living with plenty of room to entertain you and your family .Built with care it also includes tiled Alfresco and fully concrete backyard for low maintenance. This beautiful home also comes with a double car garage with internal, external access
Other luxury inclusions include:
- Refrigerated heating and cooling
- High quality kitchen with glass splashback, soft close gloss cabinets and 40mm stone benchtop with waterfall
- 900mm stainless steel appliances plus dishwasher
- Stone benchtops to kitchen, bathrooms and laundry
- Walk-in pantry
- Master bedroom with en suite bathroom and walk in closet
- Full length mirrored built-in wardrobes to bedrooms
- 2. Lounge/ activity area
- Floor to ceiling quality tiles in wet areas
- Flyscreens and roller blinds
- Intercom and security alarm
- 3 x TV connections
- Full colorbond fencing
- Landscaped
- Aggregate concrete driveway
- Coloured concrete all around the house
- Linen closet and an additional large storage area
- Outdoor lights around the house
- NBN ready
2.7m high ceilings with 3 coat paint

Description:
Brand New Quality Home...
This Lavishly Stylish Home is what you have been looking for.
Right from the moment you set eyes inside the entrance, you know this is a stylish house waiting for a family to call it their home.
With 4 generous size bedrooms, Master with ensuite and walk in robe, 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
A modern Kitchen with 40mm stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances, glass splashback, feature pendant lights, under mount sink and mixer tap,
An open plan kitchen with meals/family which already has the built-in entertainment unit, with feature wall cut out, perfect for your flat screen wall mounted tv.
What more could you ask for .. !! A spectacular must see home.. with so many more extras
Stainless Steel Appliances
Refrigerated heating/cooling
Open living area
Bathrooms have floor to ceiling tiles & shower recess
Quality porcelain tiles throughout
Laundry with stone bench top and cupboards
Alarm
Intercom
Double remote garage
Aggregated stone driveway and paths
Concrete all-round the house
Call Jessica Kaur 0435 158 564 to arrange a private inspection ......

Description:
Buy Your Dream Home Today!
A Magnificent Home all that awaits is for you to move in bring your furniture to make it a style of your own.
This house ticks all the boxes, 2 Kitchens, Large Walk-In Butlers Pantry, 4 Bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 toilets, 2 car garage, Theatre room, Alfresco, what more could you ask for?
Walk into your grand entry.
There you will find your large Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite with large shower, double vanity and separate toilet.
On down the hall, you will find your Large Theatre Room, Open plan kitchen family meals area, Walk-in butler's pantry, with sink, Stone benchtops 900mm stainless steel appliances, lots of cupboard space.
You also have your main kitchen with stone bench tops double sink and 900mm stainless steel appliances. Large alfresco area ..and decent sized back yard.
the other 3 bedroom's serviced by the central bathroom, separate toilet, laundry with stone benchtop.
Located in the up-and-coming Cloverton Estate on 400msq land close to future schools, shopping centres and public transport.
All this can be yours..
Make your dream of owning your own home come true..
Call Lorraine 0405 311 879 Today
2 Kitchens
• 4 Bedrooms
• 2 Bathrooms
• 2 Car Remote Control Garage
• Theatre room
• Alfresco
• Large Walk in Butler's Pantry
• 900mm Stainless Steel Rangehood
• 900mm Stainless Steel Cooktop/Oven
• Stainless Steel Dishwasher
• Stone Benchtops
• Ducted Heating
• Evaporative Cooling
Plus so much more.

Description:
Brand New Luxury Family Home
Land Size : 512sqm
Home Size : 27sq's approx
Built By : Simonds Homes
Location : Colverton Estate Kalkallo
If you appreciate purity of design and great home aesthetics then,this home is designed with you in mind.The use of clean lines inside and out, gives this home an uncluttered frontage and utterly roomy informal living space of approx 27sq. In this home the focus is on the open floor plan that prominently feature expansive windows, making them perfect for using natural light to illuminate the interior of the home.
Designed to accommodate both a growing family and first home buyers. The Master comprising of a WIR'S and an en suite, remaining three large Bedrooms with built in robes, formal lounge, spacious open plan living area and a great kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, stone bench top & walk in pantry.
Luxury Inclusions Offered:
* European designed stainless steel appliances
* Evaporative Cooling
* Ducted Heating
* Down lights
* High Ceilings
* Formal Living Area
* Exposed Aggregate Driveway
* Alfresco Entertaining Area
* Double Garage with secure internal access
* Driveway & much more
Colverton Estate is perfect for nature lovers after a relaxed lifestyle. Proposed sporting facilities, cycling paths, parks and playgrounds will keep you feeling healthy and active.
Minutes from the existing Donnybrook Train Station and the future Train Station, access to the Melbourne CBD will be quick and easy. Cloverton has proposed community centres, state and private primary and secondary schools, childcare options as well as a proposed tertiary institution. You will feel proud to be a part of this Boutique Community and own a patch of this great Estate.
